name: podfetch
description: PodFetch is a self-hosted podcast downloader and sync server that manages RSS feeds, handles episodes storage, and provides a web interface for browsing and downloading.
features: Podcast downloads: Automatically download episodes from subscribed podcast RSS feeds.
RSS feed management: Subscribe to and manage multiple podcast feeds from one interface.
Episode storage: Store downloaded episodes with organized file structure for easy access.
Web interface: Browse podcasts and episodes through a clean web-based UI.
Automatic updates: Check feeds regularly for new episodes and download them automatically.
Download scheduling: Configure when and how often to check for new episodes.
Storage management: Set storage limits and automatically delete old episodes to save space.
Episode filtering: Configure rules to download only specific episodes based on criteria.
Metadata extraction: Save episode metadata including titles, descriptions, and artwork.
Playback support: Stream episodes directly in the browser without downloading to device.
OPML import: Import podcast subscriptions from other apps using OPML format.
API access: Integrate with other applications using REST API for automation.
